forward.reason_msg: Could Not Delivered - Rain / Vehicle Break Down / Accident
forward.sub_group: Could Not Delivered - Rain / Vehicle Break Down / Accident

forward.reason_msg: No Such Consignee At Given Address

rvp.reason_msg: Phone number not answering/address not locatable
Pickup Not Done-Pickup Location Not Served
rvp.sub_group: Pickup Not Done-Pickup Location Not Served

rvp.reason_msg: Customer wants hand to hand replacement/refund
Customer does not want to return the product
Customer not aware about the pickup
Pickup already done through other courier
Pickup cancelled due to larger product size

rts.reason_msg: Seller refused to accept - Want open delivery
Seller refused to accept - Capacity constraint of customer
No Such Consignee At Given Address
Shipment out for delivery - could not be delivered due to Heavy Rains / Natural Calamity

eds.reason_msg: Addressee not aware about the activity (Field Update)
Addressee refused activity on field, hence cancelled by Ecom
Address not locatable and Addressee not contactable
Number not reachable / phone switched off on field
Aadhaar server authentication/ data validation failed
Activity already done as per the Addressee

doc_list.json_data: [{ "name": "Passport", "code": "Passport", "dis": "A passport is a travel document, usually issued by a country's government, that certifies the identity and nationality of its holder primarily for the purpose of international travel." }, { "name": "Driving License", "code": "Driving_License", "dis": "The Indian voter ID card is an identity document issued by the Election Commission of India which primarily serves as an identity proof for Indian citizens while casting votes in the country's municipal, state, and national elections." }, { "name": "PAN Card", "code": "PAN", "dis": "Permanent Account Number is a code that acts as an identification for individuals, families and corporates, especially those who pay Income Tax." }, { "name": "Voter ID Card", "code": "Voter_ID", "dis": "Voter’s Identity Card issued by Election Commission of India." }, { "name": "NREGA Job Card", "code": "NREGA", "dis": "Job card issued by NREGA duly signed by an officer of the State Government." }, { "name": "Aadhar Card", "code": "Aadhar", "dis": "UIDAI is mandated to issue an easily verifiable 12 digit random number as Unique Identity - Aadhaar to all Residents of India." }]

[{ "name": "Passport", "code": "Passport", "dis": "A passport is a travel document, usually issued by a country's government, that certifies the identity and nationality of its holder primarily for the purpose of international travel." }, { "name": "Driving License", "code": "Driving_License", "dis": "The Indian voter ID card is an identity document issued by the Election Commission of India which primarily serves as an identity proof for Indian citizens while casting votes in the country's municipal, state, and national elections." }, { "name": "PAN Card", "code": "PAN", "dis": "Permanent Account Number is a code that acts as an identification for individuals, families and corporates, especially those who pay Income Tax." }, { "name": "Voter ID Card", "code": "Voter_ID", "dis": "Voter’s Identity Card issued by Election Commission of India." }, { "name": "NREGA Job Card", "code": "NREGA", "dis": "Job card issued by NREGA duly signed by an officer of the State Government." }, { "name": "Aadhar Card", "code": "Aadhar", "dis": "UIDAI is mandated to issue an easily verifiable 12 digit random number as Unique Identity - Aadhaar to all Residents of India." }, { "name": "Utility bill", "code": "Utility_bill", "dis": "Physical Utility bill which is not more than two months old of any service provider (electricity, telephone, postpaid mobile phone, piped gas, water bill)" }, { "name": "Property/Municipal Tax receipt", "code": "Tax_receipt", "dis": "Property or Municipal Tax receipt" }, { "name": "Bank Account Statement", "code": "Account_Statement", "dis": "Bank Passbook, Bank account statement signed and stamped by the bank on Bank Letter Head or Post Office savings bank account statement; not more than 3 months old" }, { "name": "PPOs", "code": "PPO", "dis": "Pension or family pension payment orders (PPOs) issued to retired employees by Government Departments or Public Sector Undertakings, if they contain the address" }]

acitvity.instruction: Take Signature on the application form. In case of any doubt click here.

acitvity.instruction: Take Signature on the Agreement form. In case of any doubt click here.
acitvity.activity_question: Have you collected the Agreement Form?

acitvity.instruction: Get the Signature of account holder in the NACH form
acitvity.activity_question: Have you collected the NACH Form?

acitvity.instruction: Aadhar Card Copy & Ensure self attested with Signature
acitvity.activity_question: Have you collected the copy of Aadhar Card?

acitvity.instruction: Need to check the signature & Acc Payee mentioned in the cheque
acitvity.activity_question: Have you collected the Cheque?

acitvity.instruction: Collect the Bank Statement & Ensure same is self attested with Signature
acitvity.activity_question: Have you collected the Bank statement?

acitvity.instruction: Please Capture proper image
acitvity.activity_question: Have you collected the copy of Address Proof

acitvity.instruction: Please Capture proper image
acitvity.activity_question: Have you collected the copy of Identity Proof

acitvity.instruction: Please Capture proper image
acitvity.activity_question: Have you collected the copy of Identity Proof

acitvity.instruction: Customer photo needs to be clicked & it must contain shoulder and full face
acitvity.activity_question: Have you taken Customer Photo?

acitvity.instruction: Please Capture image of any one Original document
acitvity.activity_question: Have you collected the copy of Identity Proof?

acitvity.instruction: Please Capture image of any one Original document
acitvity.activity_question: Have you collected the copy of Address Proof?

acitvity.instruction: Collect NACH Form after two (02) signatures done  - One Page Form, Two Signatures to be checked
acitvity.activity_question: Have you collected the copy of NACH Form?

acitvity.instruction: Collect MITC Form after one (01) signature done  - One Page Form, one Signature to be checked
acitvity.activity_question: Have you collected the copy of MITC Form?
This is a test activity

acitvity.instruction: Collect Pan Card Copy and ensure same is self attested (Signature)
acitvity.activity_question: Have you collected the self attested copy of PAN Card??

acitvity.instruction: Collect Self Attested Life Insurance policy for last 3 months
acitvity.activity_question: Have you collected self attested copy of last 3 months Insurance policy?
acitvity.activity_name: Collect copy of Last 3 Months Insurance Policy

acitvity.instruction: Collect passport copy - first and last page and ensure same self attested with Signature
acitvity.activity_question: Have you collected the self attested copy of 1st and Last page of passport?
acitvity.activity_name: Collect copy of First and Last page of Passport

acitvity.instruction: Collect self attested copy of Driving Liscense Copy and take image of front and back of driving license
acitvity.activity_question: Have you collected the self attested copy of Driving License?
acitvity.activity_name: Collect self attested copy of Driving License

acitvity.instruction: Collect self attested copy of Voter ID/Election Card and take front and back image
acitvity.activity_question: Have you collected self attested copy of Voter ID/Election Card?
acitvity.activity_name: Collect Copy of Voter ID / Eclection Card

acitvity.instruction: Collect self attested Bank Passbook copy (from 1st page entry till last Entry )
acitvity.activity_question: Have you collected self attested Bank Passbook copy of all pages having entry
acitvity.activity_name: Collect Self attested Bank Passbook copy

acitvity.instruction: Collect self attested copy of First and Last page of Ration Card and take its image
acitvity.activity_question: Have you collected self attested copy of first and Last page of Ration Card?
acitvity.activity_name: Collect self attested copy of First and Last page ofRation Card

acitvity.instruction: Collect Electricity bill copy and ensure same self attested with Signature
acitvity.activity_question: Have you collected self attested copy of Electricity Bill?
acitvity.activity_name: Collect self attested copy of electricity bill

acitvity.instruction: Collect self attested copy of LPG Document
acitvity.activity_question: Have you collected the self attested copy of LPG document?
acitvity.activity_name: Collect Copy of Self attested LPG Document

acitvity.instruction: Collect Three months Old Rental Lease Deed and should be printed on the stamp Paper
acitvity.activity_question: Have you collected self attested copy of 3 months old Rental Lease Deed?
acitvity.activity_name: Collect Copy of3 months old Rental Lease Deed on stamp paper

acitvity.instruction: Collect copy of self attested (Property Tax bill/Property Ownership Record)
acitvity.activity_question: Have you collected copy of self attested Property Tax Bill/Property Ownership Record?
acitvity.activity_name: Collect copy of Property Tax bill/Property Ownership Record

acitvity.instruction: Collect the Ownership Deed  Photocopy ensure same self attested with Signature
acitvity.activity_question: Have you collected copy of self attested Ownership Deed?

acitvity.instruction: Collect self attested copy of Telephone bill (Landline /Post paid Mobile Bill)
acitvity.activity_question: Have you collected self attested copy of Telephone bill
acitvity.activity_name: Collect self attested copy of Telephone Bill

acitvity.instruction: See Original ID and write OSR, Agent Name, Agent code, Company Name ie Ecom Express & sign on each page
acitvity.activity_question: Have you collected the copy of Address Proof?
acitvity.activity_name: Collect self attested Proof of Address

acitvity.instruction: See Original ID and write OSR, Agent Name, Agent code, Company Name ie Ecom Express & sign on each page
acitvity.activity_question: Have you collected the copy of Address Proof?

acitvity.instruction: See Original ID and write OSR, Agent Name, Agent code, Company Name ie Ecom Express & sign on each page
acitvity.activity_question: Have you collected the copy of Identity Proof?

acitvity.instruction: See Original ID and write OSR, Agent Name, Agent code, Company Name ie Ecom Express & sign on each page
acitvity.activity_question: Have you collected the copy of Identity Proof?

acitvity.instruction: 1 signature should be taken from customer  in the place of Customer Signature (Required fields – Application number, Applicant’s name, customer signature and date.
acitvity.activity_question: Have you collected the consent Form?

acitvity.instruction: Collect Self Attested last 2 months pay slip and write Print from portal (PFP)  Agent Name, Agent code, Company Name ie Ecom Express & Staff need to do the signature - Against Each page.
acitvity.activity_question: Have you collected Last 2 Months Pay Slip?
acitvity.activity_name: Collect Last two Months self attested Pay Slip

acitvity.instruction: Two Signed cheques needs to be collected.
acitvity.activity_question: Have you collected the Post Dated Cheques?

acitvity.instruction: Check the signature and collect the Form.
acitvity.activity_question: Have you collected the NACH Form?
Have you taken Customer Photo?
Have you collected the Agreement?
Have you collected the SI Form?
Have you collected the copy of Identity Proof?
Have you collected the copy of Address Proof?

acitvity.instruction: One Cheque to be collected in favour of "The Federal Bank Limited" and ensure signature done and Account Pay mentioned (Top Left of the cheque) and amount column is not blank. Click Here to view sample document.
acitvity.activity_question: Have you collected the PDC?

acitvity.instruction: Need to ensure that customer fills : Aadhar Number, Date, Name & Signature. Click Here to view sample document.
acitvity.activity_question: Have you collected the Terms and Collections Form?

acitvity.instruction: Click the picture of the signature ONLY taken on T&C form. Click Here to view sample document.
acitvity.activity_question: Have you taken photo of Signature taken on Terms and Conditions Page?

acitvity.instruction: Ensure customer to put signatures at the required fields and ensure Tick any one option from first Two Option given and accordingly fills the relevant detail. Click Here to view sample document.

acitvity.instruction: Please take photo from Front of the shop / plot/ office on the right hand side of given address

acitvity.instruction: Please take photo from Front (Showing board / address)of the shop / office as per address mentioned on SAATHI app
acitvity.activity_question: Take the Addressee Shop/ Office Photo from Front

acitvity.instruction: Please ensure to complete the activity on PAYTM app, before marking the lead as completed.
acitvity.activity_question: Have you completed the activity on PAYTM App?

acitvity.instruction: Collect one cheque from the customer in Favour of L&T Finance Ltd and ensure Signature
acitvity.activity_question: Have you collected Security PDC (SPDC) Cheque?

acitvity.instruction: Collect one cheque from the customer in Favour of L&T Finance Ltd and ensure Signature
acitvity.activity_question: Have you collected Post Dated Cheque (PDC)?

acitvity.instruction: 1 Page - 03 Signatures to be checked
acitvity.activity_question: Have you collected NACH Form?

acitvity.instruction: Collect One copy of NACH form and check one SIgnature
acitvity.activity_question: Have you collected NACH Form?
Have you received the copy of address proof?
acitvity.activity_name: Self-Attested copy of Residence proof with current address mentioned

acitvity.activity_question: Enter last 5 characters of original pan card
Confirm Customer Details

general_question.qtag: Take Photo of Passport Copy (1st Page)
Take Photo of Passport Copy (Last Page)

sample_question.instructions: Take a Print of the form using link in Item Description

sample_question.instructions: Ensure form is signed

sample_question.name: Ensure there is no cutting on the form.
sample_question.instructions: Ensure form is completely filled by customer and there is no overwriting

sample_question.instructions: Collect Cancelled Cheque/Bank Statement Copy/Passbook copy

sample_question.instructions: Collect signed check from the customer

sample_question.name: Has consignee removed SIM and Memory card from the phone?
sample_question.instructions: Ask consignee to remove SIM and Memory card from the phone before handing it over to you.

sample_question.instructions: Collect the SIM Tray (in case of External SIM Tray)
